### =========================================================================
### HGU95AV2DB template
###   Possible DBschemas for this template: HGU95AV2_DB, YEAST2_DB, AG_DB
###   Fields:
###     Package
###     Version
###     PkgTemplate
###     DBfile
###     DBschema
###     AnnObjPrefix
###     AnnObjTarget
###     organism
###     species
###     manufacturer
###     chipName
###     manufacturerUrl
###     biocViews

Package: hgu95av2db
Version: 1.13.95
PkgTemplate: HGU95AV2DB
DBfile: /home/nli/proj/ann/nli/annosrc/affychip/2007-Mar5/human/hgu95av2.sqlite
DBschema: HGU95AV2_DB
AnnObjPrefix: hgu95av2
AnnObjTarget: chip hgu95av2
organism: Homo sapiens
species: Human
manufacturer: Affymetrix
chipName: Human Genome U95 Set
manufacturerUrl: http://www.affymetrix.com/support/technical/byproduct.affx?product=hgu95
biocViews: AffymetrixChip, Homo_sapiens, hgu95av2

Package: humanLLMappingsdb
